go to 
https://github.com/jgm/pandoc/releases/tag/3.7.0.2
dowload extract
pandoc-3.7.0.2-windows-x86_64.zip
example of extracted folder
C:\Users\a037702\NotSynchronized\pandoc-3.7.0.2

download and isntall (admin)
https://wkhtmltopdf.org/downloads.html


final cmd 
"C:\Users\a037702\NotSynchronized\pandoc-3.7.0.2\pandoc.exe" ^
 "01_LLC_48v_LLC_tank_design_note_v2.html" ^
 -t pdf --pdf-engine="C:\Program Files\wkhtmltopdf\bin\wkhtmltopdf.exe" ^
 -o "01_LLC_48v_LLC_tank_design_note_v2.pdf"



NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOK THE PDF IS NOT NICE THE TEXT IS NOK I don't like it
